title: A new enterlude, neuer before this tyme imprinted, entreating of the life and repentaunce of Marie Magdalene not only godlie, learned and fruitefull, but also well furnished with pleasaunt myrth and pastime, very delectable for those which shall heare or reade the same. Made by the learned clarke Lewis Wager. The names of the players. Infidelitie the vice. Marie Magdalene. Pride of life. Cupiditie. Carnall concupiscence. Simon the Pharisie. Malicious iudgement. The lawe. Knowledge of sinne. Christ Iesus. Fayth. Repentaunce. Iustification. Loue. Foure may easely play this enterlude.
author: Wager, Lewis, fl. 1566.
publisher: By Iohn Charlevvood, dwelling in Barbican, at the signe of the halfe Eagle and the Key,
notes: Running title reads: An enterlude of the repentance of Mary Magdalene.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
